attributes.action: Implement safe haven baby boxes in the UK like the US has
attributes.additional_details: Too many babies are being found abandoned, a safe haven baby box would give the baby best chance to survive
attributes.background: Get this implemented ASAP every baby deserves a chance no matter what

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Introduce New Safe Haven Law and baby boxes to Save Infants and Support Mothers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701043
